description: Under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, variation of Condition 2 of planning permission 20/03881/FULL1 dated 25.02.2022 for (Demolition of existing buildings (79 and 79A Bromley Road) and construction of new building over lower ground, ground, first, second and third floors to provide 27 Class C3 (residential) units, provision of car parking, landscaping and associated works) to allow for alterations including: elevational and roof alterations, increase in basement footprint, erection of ventilation structure to basement car park, internal layout alterations to the flats, alterations to unit mix of flats, and submission of condition details:Condition 8 - Tree PlantingCondition 9 - Boundary TreatmentsCondition 10 - Refuse storageCondition 11 - Cycle parkingCondition 12 - Highway DrainageCondition 13 - Service and Delivery Plan (during construction)Condition 14 - Noise attenuation (acoustic glazing)Condition 15 - Ventilation/Heat Recovery System (VHRS)Condition 18 - Electric Vehicle Charging PointsCondition 19 - Existing highway access Stopping UpCondition 20 - Car Park Management SchemeCondition 21 - Secure by DesignCondition 22 - Ecological Enhancements
